description: This pipeline is designed to test the system's ability to handle concurrent operations. It includes a single action stage that deliberately pauses execution for 10 seconds, allowing developers to observe how the system manages multiple pipelines running simultaneously.

stages.description: This stage executes a sleep command that pauses the pipeline for 10 seconds. It is used to simulate a long-running operation and test concurrency handling. The 'prompt' field specifies the exact command ('sleep 10') sent to the system for execution. The output labeled 'return_code' indicates the success or failure of the sleep command, with an integer value where 0 typically means success.
